title: Digital Comic Production and Transmedia Maker Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital tool proficiency and foundational literary text analysis
context.additional_context: Students expand creative expression skills using smart devices and social media tools, experiencing a process of reinterpreting literary texts through digital comic creation. Operated in an environment combining online (theory/production tool learning) and offline (collaboration/feedback sessions) activities.

learning_goals: Learners can reconstruct core themes of literary works through transmedia approaches using digital comic creation tools (e.g., Canva, ClipStudio Paint)
Learners can document production processes and incorporate peer feedback using smartphone-based social media apps (e.g., Instagram, TikTok)
Learners can analyze meaning-making processes by integrating multimodal elements (text, images, sound) and propose reinterpretations of school spaces (virtual/physical)
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
